full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 759 Filed 08/10/22 Page 174 of 267 2202 LCAVMAX6 A. Farmer - cross 1 Q. Have you read anywhere in the press how much money your lawyers have made in connection with representing Epstein accusers? MS. POMERANTZ: Objection. Hearsay. THE COURT: Sustained. Q. You know that Virginia Roberts was also represented by your attorneys; correct? MS. POMERANTZ: Objection. MS. MENNINGER: I can lay a foundation. THE COURT: You may inquire. MS. POMERANTZ: Relevance and hearsay. Q. You were preparing to testify in a civil case? THE COURT: Just a minute. MS. MENNINGER: Oh, I'm sorry. THE COURT: If there's an objection, you have to give me a minute to rule. MS. MENNINGER: I thought you had, your Honor. I apologize. THE COURT: I had on the prior ones. Overruled. You may inquire. BY MS. MENNINGER: Q. You were preparing to testify in a civil case in or around 2016 or 2017; correct? A. Correct. Q. And the lawyers you were interacting with in that case, the SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00013765
